item.title: Why I made this blog?
item.description: In the chilhood, I had blog only once and never thought, I’ll create any blog again. ðŸ˜Š About week ago at work, I had to find solution for problem with angular, which I solved half year ago. Digging these same pages led me to fix it. After that, I wrote message to my friend TehGM about it to let my flustration out. He sugested me to create blog and document how I solve problems.
